name: Aurora Dynamics
statement_zh: 提供 DECODE 赛季底盘碳纤板及加工窗口。
statement_en: Provides CFRP plates and machining windows for DECODE.

name: NOVA Robotics Lab
statement_zh: 开放周末实验室并赞助传感器套件。
statement_en: Opens weekend lab hours and sponsors sensor kits.

name: BitOcean Cloud
statement_zh: 提供算力与 CI / CD 资源，支持远程调试。
statement_en: Donates cloud compute for CI/CD and remote debugging.

name: MakerTown
statement_zh: 协助社区科普活动与青少年工作坊。
statement_en: Supports outreach workshops with tools and mentors.
